remarks: We can extend an acceptable function by one element to produce an acceptable function.  Lemma for ~ tfrlemi1 .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 4-Mar-2019.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2019.)
statement:
tfrlemisucfn.1 $e |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } $.
tfrlemisucfn.2 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ( Fun F /\ ( F ` x ) e. _V ) ) $.
tfrlemisucfn.3 $e |- ( ph -> z e. On ) $.
tfrlemisucfn.4 $e |- ( ph -> g Fn z ) $.
tfrlemisucfn.5 $e |- ( ph -> g e. A ) $.
tfrlemisucaccv $p |- ( ph -> ( g u. { <. z , ( F ` g ) >. } ) e. A ) $.
$d A f g x y z $.
$d F f g x y z $.
$d ph y $.
